comments: He is still a grad student and as such hasn\'t completely developed his teaching skills. He\'s little disorganized, but very approachable. He has study sessions for those who are lagging behind. The class is not rocket science so if you pay adequate attention you can get an A.
Most Confusing Professor I have ever had!

This class sucked & I hated ever minute. He was confusing, disorganized, & not very helpful. He is a grad student, & that was very clear to the class. Not a single person in my class enjoyed him as our professor. If there is another professor available, take that class. If not, wait until the next semester for a different teacher. Trust me. Run.

Average class, not too easy, not too hard. I passed with an A. Boesiger isn\'t horrible, but not great either. You basically do the work and you should be fine. He was a little unclear on some stuff, but overall a decent teacher. Attendance not mandatory, but recommended to get good grade. You absolutely need the textbook to pass.

jason is a cool guy but this is a really hard class. he is a grad student and totally knows what hes talking about but cant explain it at all. everyone in my class fails every test. he just doesnt make sense. you do need the books and to attend class. i wouldnt say avoid him but if theres another class open take it. he is hard
